metadata.title: CVE-2023-52590 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ocfs2: Avoid touching renamed directory if parent does not changeThe VFS will not be locking moved directory if its parent does notchange. Change ocfs2 rename code to avoid touching renamed directory ifits parent does not change as without locking that can corrupt thefilesystem.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
